00018     float Neuron::activate()
00019     {

00023     void Neuron::connectTo(Neuron& _to, Link::Direction _direction = Link::out, float _weightValue = 1)

00028     void Neuron::connectTo(Neuron& _to, Weight* _weight, Link::Direction _direction = Link::out)
00029     {
00030         //ACHTUNG!!! Parallel links ARE allowed
00031         links.push_back( Link(_to, _direction, _weight) ); //feedforward link
00032         _direction == Link::in ? _direction = Link::out : _direction = Link::in;
00033         _to.links.push_back( Link(*this, _direction, _weight) ); //backpropagation link
00034     } //connectTo
